mapper.select: SELECT TRANSACTION_IDX , COMPANY_IDX , DATE , TRANSACTION_TYPE , SUBJECT FROM TRANSACTION WHERE COMPANY_IDX = #{company_idx} ORDER BY DATE DESC, TRANSACTION_IDX DESC
SELECT TRANSACTION_IDX , COMPANY_IDX , DATE , TRANSACTION_TYPE , SUBJECT FROM TRANSACTION WHERE TRANSACTION_IDX = #{transaction_idx}

SELECT T1.ITEM_IDX , T1.TRANSACTION_IDX , T1.INVENTORY_ITEM_IDX , T2.ITEM_CODE , T1.CONTENT , T1.AMOUNT , T1.UNIT_PRICE , T1.SUPPLY_PRICE , T1.TAX_PRICE , T1.TOTAL_PRICE FROM ITEM T1 JOIN INVENTORY_ITEM T2 ON T1.INVENTORY_ITEM_IDX = T2.ITEM_IDX WHERE TRANSACTION_IDX = #{transaction_idx}
SELECT MEMO_IDX , TRANSACTION_IDX , CONTENT FROM MEMO WHERE TRANSACTION_IDX = #{transaction_idx}

SELECT T1.FILE_IDX , T1.TRANSACTION_IDX , T1.FILE_NAME , CONCAT( (SELECT PATH FROM PATH WHERE PATH_NAME='FILE_ROOT') , "\\" , T3.COMPANY_NAME , "[" , T3.COMPANY_IDX , "]\\" , LEFT(T2.DATE, 4) , "\\" , CASE WHEN T1.FILE_TYPE = 'QUOTE' THEN '견적서' WHEN T1.FILE_TYPE = 'ORDER' THEN '작업지시서' WHEN T1.FILE_TYPE = 'IMAGE' THEN '사진' WHEN T1.FILE_TYPE = 'OTHER' THEN '기타' END) AS FILE_PATH , FILE_TYPE FROM FILE T1 JOIN TRANSACTION T2 ON T1.TRANSACTION_IDX = T2.TRANSACTION_IDX JOIN COMPANY T3 ON T2.COMPANY_IDX = T3.COMPANY_IDX WHERE T1.TRANSACTION_IDX = #{transaction_idx}
AND T1.FILE_TYPE = #{file_type}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILE(TRANSACTION_IDX, FILE_NAME, FILE_TYPE) VALUES (#{transaction_idx}, #{file_name}, #{file_type})
